ch.dermitza.securenio.packet

Interface PacketIF

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTestPacket, PacketPing, PacketPong, PacketUnknown, SimplePacket, TestPacketOne

    public interface PacketIF
    A network packet interface, containing required methods to create an application-level packet, to reconstrust such a packet from raw bytes received, and to get the contents of this packet as raw bytes. The implementation specific details are application dependent.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      short getHeader()
      Get the header of this packet
      void reconstruct(java.nio.ByteBuffer source)
      Reconstruct this PacketIF from the given ByteBuffer
      java.nio.ByteBuffer toBytes()
      Get the contents of this PacketIF as a ByteBuffer

    • Method Detail

      • getHeader

        short getHeader()
        Get the header of this packet
        Returns:
        The header of this packet, can be 1 or 2 bytes long

      • reconstruct

        void reconstruct(java.nio.ByteBuffer source)
        Reconstruct this PacketIF from the given ByteBuffer
        Parameters:
        source - The ByteBuffer to reconstruct this PacketIF from

      • toBytes

        java.nio.ByteBuffer toBytes()
        Get the contents of this PacketIF as a ByteBuffer
        Returns:
        the contents of this PacketIF as a ByteBuffer
